    int i)

        b - Humidity Value (0,100)
        c - Fertility Value (0,100)
        d - Index of Ore Type
        e - Quantity of Ore
        f - Depth of Ore (-100,100) <= Elevation
        g - Index of Lumber Type
        h - Quantity of Lumber
